Blacknightmare:

"She will confort him, perfectly"said bitery the femme, wh=
ose started to sob again"And dangers outside aren't enough to remain here..=
. I just want to come back with my sister... Please" she said with tears in=
 her eyes "Be my escourt to go with my sister or let me go alone... but I w=
on't remain here a second more ..."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From:=
 Ultimate Warrior of Red Chaos 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monda=
y, April 11, 2005 1:03 AM
  Subject: Re: Wolf Tears



  Megatron Revived:
=

  He sighed heavily, this was definetly not good.

  "No, it's not over.  =
He had to choose, he would be living a lie if he 
  tried to make it work o=
ut.  He's not trying to hurt you, he's trying 
  to help you the best way h=
e can.  if you leave, it would most likely 
  kill him.  I will not allow y=
ou to leave, for Malice's sake and for 
  your own, as it is dangerous for =
you beyond the safety of the base 
  without escourt.  You should stay, thi=
ngs will improve for you, I 
  assure it."
